title: WTBT T205 Bridwell SC Black, Hassan 30, Piedmont 42

posts.post_title: WTBT T205 Bridwell SC Black, Hassan 30, Piedmont 42
posts.post_content: Hey, gang, trying to complete a T205 Bridwell back run. Paying or trading well for Sweet Caporal 25 and 42 Black back. Hassan 30 and Piedmont 42. Let me know if you have any of these, Let's make a deal! Rob
